alert.note: Alert for Copiah; Covington; Jefferson Davis; Lawrence; Lincoln; Rankin; Simpson (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 18 at 3:51AM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Rankin, Simpson, southeastern Lincoln, Lawrence, northwestern Covington, eastern Copiah and Jefferson Davis Counties through 430 AM CDT... At 351 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Whites to Oma to near Jayess. Movement was east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Rockport, Harrisville and Whites around 355 AM CDT. Star and Union around 400 AM CDT. Pinola, Piney Woods, Shivers, Tilton and Robinwood around 405 AM CDT. Oak Vale and Arm around 410 AM CDT. Cato, Johns, Society Hill and Progress around 415 AM CDT. Magee and Sanatorium around 420 AM CDT. Mount Olive and Carson around 425 AM CDT. Other locations impacted by these storms include New Hebron, Silver Creek, Bassfield, Puckett, D`Lo, Braxton and Georgetown. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Copiah; Covington; Jefferson Davis; Lawrence; Lincoln; Rankin; Simpson
